title: Trojan War
description: Trojan War is a tower defense game where you find yourself in the midst of a war and must defend yourself against relentless enemies. Assemble your army and strategically position towers to counter the enemy's attacks. Upgrade your weapons and towers as you progress through each level to strengthen your defenses. Employ strategic thinking and skillful tactics to effectively attack your enemies and avoid defeat. Prepare yourself for the challenges ahead and strive for victory in this intense war!
